paragraphs.title: jScrollpane
paragraphs.text: JScrollPane is a jQuery plugin cross-browser developed by Luck Kelvin that converts browsers default scrollbars in a HTML structure that can be easily stylized in CSS: JScrollPane

paragraphs.title: Metro JS
paragraphs.text: Metro JS is a jQuery plugin conceived to easily create Windows 8 interface for web sites: Metro Js

paragraphs.title: Nivo-Slider
paragraphs.text: Nivo-Slider is a jQuery plugin designed to build awesome image sliders: Nivo-Slider
